channel.title: Swats emote system
channel.description:
not sure if this is client or server sided but...... well i added swats new emote system cause i finally realized blurrs is horrible so i downloaded 317 client loading a 377 cache. so 317/377 deob? anyways i get no errors (well i did but i worked em out) and when I do veng emote (4410) (the emote he gives us in his tut) I do ::emote 4410 in game and I get this error:
Loading 317 cache Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4411 at client.method101(client.java:7753) at client.method96(client.java:7512) at client.method114(client.java:8884) at client.method62(client.java:3013) at client.method7(client.java:2029) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:119) at client.run(client.java:4467) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
sorry if this goes ina diff section but this section gets the most answers! EDIT: FIXED JUST HAD TO ADD HIS OTHER TUT

item.title: Swats emote system
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

i did swats extening emote tut and it worked :o

Read full topic

item.title: Swats emote system
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Go into your client class and search for line number 7753 and tell us what it is. Your chances of getting help will exponentially increase.

Read full topic
